member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView
member.summary: Defines methods and properties that a collection view implements to provide paging capabilities to a collection.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.CanChangePage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the value can change.
member.returns: true if the value can change; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.IsPageChanging
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the page index is changing.
member.returns: true if the page index is changing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets the number of known items in the view before paging is applied.
member.returns: The number of known items in the view before paging is applied.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.MoveToFirstPage
member.summary: Sets the first page as the current page.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.MoveToLastPage
member.summary: Sets the last page as the current page.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.MoveToNextPage
member.summary: Moves to the page after the current page.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.MoveToPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves to the page at the specified index.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.
member.param: The index of the page to move to.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.MoveToPreviousPage
member.summary: Moves to the page before the current page.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: E:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.PageChanged
member.summary: When implementing this interface, raise this event after the has changed.

member.name: E:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.PageChanging
member.summary: When implementing this interface, raise this event before changing the . The event handler can cancel this event.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the current page.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the current page.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items to display on a page.
member.returns: The number of items to display on a page.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.IPagedCollectionView.TotalItemCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of items in the view before paging is applied.
member.returns: The total number of items in the view before paging is applied, or -1 if the total number is unknown.

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.PageChangingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.PageChangingEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The index of the requested page.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.PageChangingEventArgs.NewPageIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the requested page.
member.returns: The index of the requested page.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Data.GroupDescriptionSelectorCallback
member.summary: Represents a method that is used to provide custom logic to select the based on the parent group and its level.
member.returns: The selected based on the parent group and its level.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView
member.summary: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a paged data collection.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies whether the data is sorted and in group order.
member.param: Specifies whether the source is already sorted.
Specifies whether the source is already in the correct order for grouping.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.AddNew
member.summary: Adds a new item to the underlying collection.
member.returns: The new item that is being added.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanAddNew
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.
member.returns: true if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanCancelEdit
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.
member.returns: true if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CancelEdit
member.summary: Ends the edit transaction and, if it is possible, restores the original value of the item.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CancelNew
member.summary: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanChangePage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the value can change.
member.returns: true in all cases.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanFilter
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports filtering by way of the property.
member.returns: true in all cases.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanGroup
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports grouping.
member.returns: true in all cases.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanRemove
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether an item can be removed from the collection.
member.returns: true if an item can be removed from the collection; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this view supports sorting.
member.returns: true in all cases.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CollectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the view has changed.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CommitEdit
member.summary: Ends the edit transaction and saves the pending changes.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CommitNew
member.summary: Ends the add transaction and saves the pending new item.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item belongs to this collection view.
member.returns: true if the specified item belongs to this collection view; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of records in the view after filtering, sorting, and paging.
member.returns: The number of records in the view after filtering, sorting, and paging.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the cultural information for any operations of the view that might differ by culture, such as sorting.
member.returns: The culture to use during view operations.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentAddItem
member.summary: Gets the item that is being added when an transaction is in progress.
member.returns: The item that is being added if is true; otherwise, null.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentChanged
member.summary: Occurs after the has changed.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentChanging
member.summary: Occurs when the is changing.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentEditItem
member.summary: Gets the item in the collection that is being edited when an transaction is in progress.
member.returns: The item that is being edited if is true; otherwise, null.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentItem
member.summary: Gets the current item in the view.
member.returns: The current item in the view or null if there is no current item.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.CurrentPosition
member.summary: Gets the ordinal position of the in the view, which might be sorted and filtered.
member.returns: The ordinal position of the in the view.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.DeferRefresh
member.summary: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
member.returns: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.EditItem(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an edit transaction on the specified item.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.Filter
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback that is used to determine whether an item is suited for inclusion in the view.
member.returns: A method that is used to determine whether an item is suited for inclusion in the view.
member.exception: The implementation does not support filtering.Simpler implementations do not support filtering and will throw a . Check the property to test whether filtering is supported before assigning a non-null value.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Data.PagedCollectionView.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
member.returns: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

member.summary: Gets the item at the specified zero-based index in this , after the source collection is filtered, sorted, and paged.
member.returns: The item at the specified zero-based index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the item to retrieve.
member.exception: is less than 0, or greater than or equal to the of items in the view.

member.returns: A collection of objects that describe how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.

member.summary: Gets the top-level groups, constructed according to the descriptions specified in the property.
